data.comment: The match has started, with Arsenal Tula kicking-off.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kirill Panchenko scores to make it 1-0 at Arsenal Stadium.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Volgograd's Azat Bairyyev has been booked in Tula.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 16, Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Volgograd drives forward and Flamarion gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal Tula's Kings Kangwa gets in a shot on goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Volgograd push forward at Arsenal Stadium and Andres Ponce gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 24, Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Volgograd, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
In Tula, Oleg Kozhemyakin of Volgograd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 26, In Tula Volgograd drive forward through Zurab Davitashvili. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Volgograd's Sergey Makarov has been booked in Tula and will miss the next match through suspension.
In the minute 27, Stanislav Vasilev blows against Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy for offside.
Volgograd pushes forward through Andres Ponce, whose finish on goal is saved.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 29, Volgograd's Saba Kverkvelia attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Volgograd.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Volgograd drive upfield and Zurab Davitashvili gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal Tula defender.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 33, Volgograd are coming forward and Danil Stepanov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Volgograd to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Volgograd just outside Arsenal Tula's area.
Nikolay Rasskazov (Arsenal Tula) has received a yellow card from Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 37, Volgograd's Sergey Makarov breaks free at Arsenal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
At Arsenal Stadium, Azat Bairyyev has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 38, In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dmitri Parfenov (Arsenal Tula) is making a first substitution, with Daniil Khlusevich replacing Nikolay Rasskazov.
Attention is being given to Arsenal Tulaâ€™s Luka Djordjevic and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Luka Djordjevic has recovered and rejoins the match in Tula.
Arsenal Tula are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal Tula in Tula.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 45, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
At Arsenal Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Volgograd's Zurab Davitashvili gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, The match at Arsenal Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kings Kangwa, who is down injured.
The second-half has commenced. Volgograd with the kick-off.
Arsenal Tula's Kings Kangwa is back in action after a slight knock.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Volgograd's half.
In the minute 46, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Evans Kangwa with Sergey Tkachyov. This is the second substitution made today by Dmitri Parfenov.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 47, Stanislav Vasilev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Robert Bauer of Arsenal Tula gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 52, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Arsenal Tula push upfield and Kirill Panchenko gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Volgograd defence.
In the minute 55, In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sergey Tkachyov (Arsenal Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Tula Arsenal Tula attack through Sergey Tkachyov. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Arsenal Tula's Robert Bauer fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aleksandr Dovbnya (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick Volgograd.
In the minute 60, Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal Tula's half?
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Volgograd throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
The away team replace Sergey Makarov with Oleg Aleynik.
In the minute 62, Danil Stepanov (Volgograd) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Oleg Kozhemyakin instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 64, Luka Djordjevic (Arsenal Tula) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
At Arsenal Stadium, Zurab Davitashvili has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 70, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In Tula, Gia Grigalava (Arsenal Tula) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
In the minute 71, Arsenal Tula's Robert Bauer gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tula to check on Oleg Aleynik, who is grimacing with pain.
Oleg Aleynik is back on his feet again.
In the minute 72, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Beka Mikeltadze is replacing Flamarion for Volgograd at Arsenal Stadium.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Arsenal Tula's Sergey Tkachyov misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Volgograd at Arsenal Stadium.
Throw-in Volgograd.
Volgograd to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 77, Kirill Panchenko's header is off-target for Arsenal Tula.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 79, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Arsenal Tula's Kirill Panchenko breaks free at Arsenal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Arsenal Stadium.
Volgograd's Andres Ponce is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Kirill Panchenko for Arsenal Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Arsenal Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Cedric Gogoua (Volgograd) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 84, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula's Sergey Tkachyov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
In the minute 85, Anri Hagush is on a sub for Alesandr Lomovitskiy for Arsenal Tula.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
In the minute 86, Sergey Tkachyov (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Kings Kangwa fires in a strike for Arsenal Tula.
Important block from the Volgograd defence as Kirill Panchenko fires in a strike for Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 86, Arsenal Tula are pushing forward but Sergey Tkachyov's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Stanislav Vasilev waits before resuming play because Oleg Kozhemyakin for Volgograd is still down.
Oleg Kozhemyakin returns to the field for Volgograd after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 89, Arsenal Tula are caught offside.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Volgograd have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Volgograd in Tula.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gia Grigalava gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal Tula.
Volgograd needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Arsenal Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
Sergey Serchenkov is replacing Andres Ponce for the away team.
Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's fourth substitution at Arsenal Stadium with Kamil Mullin replacing Zurab Davitashvili.
